C

Cipher - Class in <Unnamed>
A simple substitution cipher.

D

decodeChar(char) - Static method in class Cipher
Helper method to decode an individual character using a simple-substitution cipher.
decrypt(String) - Static method in class Cipher
Decrypts a given ciphertext using the globally-defined key.

E

encodeChar(char) - Static method in class Cipher
Helper method to encode an individual character using a simple-substitution cipher.
encrypt(String) - Static method in class Cipher
Encrypts a given plaintext using the globally-defined key.

L

M
